crit.title: Minor Nick
crit.desc: The target suffers 1 strain.

crit.title: Slowed Down
crit.desc: The target can only act during the last allied Initiative slot on his next turn.

crit.title: Sudden Jolt
crit.desc: The target drops whatever is in hand.

crit.title: Distracted
crit.desc: The target cannot perform a free maneuver during his next turn.

crit.title: Off-Balance
crit.desc: Add 1S to the target's next skill check.

crit.title: Discouraging Wound
crit.desc: Flip one light side Destiny Point to a dark side Destiny Point (reverse if NPC).

crit.title: Stunned
crit.desc: The target is staggered until the end of his next turn.

crit.title: Stinger
crit.desc: Increase difficulty of next check by one.

crit.title: Bowled Over
crit.desc: The target is knocked prone and suffers 1 strain.

crit.title: Head Ringer
crit.desc: The target increases the difficulty of all Intellect and Cunning checks by one until the end of the encounter.

crit.title: Fearsome Wound
crit.desc: The target increases the difficulty of all Presence and Willpower checks by one until the end of the encounter.

crit.title: Agonizing Wound
crit.desc: The target increases the difficulty of all Brawn and Agility checks by one until the end of the encounter.

crit.title: Slightly Dazed
crit.desc: The target is disoriented until the end of the encounter.

crit.title: Scattered Senses
crit.desc: The target removes all B from skill checks until the end of the encounter.

crit.title: Hamstrung
crit.desc: The target loses his free maneuver until the end of the encounter.

crit.title: Overpowered
crit.desc: The target leaves himself open, and the attacker may immediately attempt another free attack against him. using the exact same pool as the original attack.

crit.title: Winded
crit.desc: Until the end of the encounter, the target cannot voluntarily suffer strain to activate any abilities or gain additional maneuvers.

crit.title: Compromised
crit.desc: Increase difficulty of all skill checks by one until the end of the encounter.

crit.title: At the Brink
crit.desc: The target suffers 1 strain each time he performs an action.

crit.title: Crippled
crit.desc: One of the target's limbs (selected by the GM) is crippled until healed or replaced. Increase difficulty of all checks that require use of that limb by one.

crit.title: Maimed
crit.desc: One of the target's limbs (selected by the GM) is permanently lost. Unless the target has a cybernetic replacement, the target cannot perform actions that would require the use of that limb. All other actions gain 1S.

crit.title: Horrific Injury
crit.desc: Roll to determine an attribute. Until this Critical Injury is healed, treat that characteristic as 1 point lower.

crit.title: Temporarily Lame
crit.desc: Until this Critical Injury is healed, the target cannot perform more than one maneuver during his turn.

crit.title: Blinded
crit.desc: The target can no longer see. Upgrade the difficulty of all checks twice. Upgrade the difficulty of Perception and Vigilance checks three times.

crit.title: Knocked Senseless
crit.desc: The target is staggered for the remainder of the encounter.

crit.title: Gruesome Injury
crit.desc: Roll to determine an attribute. That characteristic is permanently reduced by 1. to a minimum of 1.

crit.title: Bleeding Out
crit.desc: Every round, the target suffers 1 wound and 1 strain at the beginning of his turn. For every 5 wounds he suffers beyond his wound threshold, he suffers 1 additional Critical Injury. Roll on the chart, suffering the injury (if he suffers this result a second time due to this, roll again).

crit.title: The End is Nigh
crit.desc: The target will die after the last Initiative slot during the next round.

crit.title: Dead
crit.desc: Complete, obliterated death.

shipcrit.title: Mechanical Stress
shipcrit.desc: The ship or vehicle suffers 1 point of system strain.

shipcrit.title: Jostled
shipcrit.desc: A small explosion or impact rocks the vehicle. All crew members suffer 1 strain and are disoriented for one round.

shipcrit.title: Losing Power to Shields
shipcrit.desc: Decrease defense in affected defense zone by 1 until the Critical Hit is repaired. If the ship or vehicle has no defense, suffer 1 point of system strain.

shipcrit.title: Knocked Off Course
shipcrit.desc: A particularly strong blast or impact sends the ship or vehicle careening off in a new direction. On his next turn, the pilot cannot execute any maneuvers and must make a Piloting check to regain control. The difficulty of this check depends on his current speed.

shipcrit.title: Tailspin
shipcrit.desc: All firing from the ship or vehicle suffers 2S until the end of the pilot's next turn. All crewmembers are immobilized until the end of the pilot's next turn.

shipcrit.title: Component Hit
shipcrit.desc: One component of the attacker's choice is knocked offline and is rendered inoperable until the end of the following round. Use !shipsystems <small/large> for a list of systems by silhouette.

shipcrit.title: Shields Failing
shipcrit.desc: Reduce defense in all defense zones by 1 point until the Critical Hit is repaired. If the ship or vehicle has no defense, suffer 2 points of system strain.

shipcrit.title: Navicomputer Failure
shipcrit.desc: The navicomputer (or in the case of a ship without a navicomputer. its R2 unit) fails, and the ship cannot make the jump to hyperspace until the Critical Hit is repaired. If the ship or vehicle is without a hyperdrive. the vehicle or ship's navigation systems fail, leaving it flying or driving blind, unable to tell where it is or where it's going.

shipcrit.title: Power Fluctuations
shipcrit.desc: The ship or vehicle is beset by random power surges and outages The pilot cannot voluntarily inflict system strain on the ship (to gain an extra starship maneuver, for example) until this Critical Hit is repaired.

shipcrit.title: Shields Down
shipcrit.desc: Decrease defense in affected defense zone to 0, and decrease defense in all other defense zones by 1 until this Critical Hit is repaired. While the defense of the affected defense zone cannot be restored until the Critical Hit is repaired, defense from other zones can be assigned to protect that defense zone as usual. If the ship or vehicle is without defense, suffer 4 points of system strain.

shipcrit.title: Engine Damaged
shipcrit.desc: The ship or vehicle's maximum speed is reduced by 1 point, to a minimum of 1, until the Critical Hit is repaired.

shipcrit.title: Shield Overload
shipcrit.desc: The ship's shields completely fail. Decrease the defense of all defense zones to 0. This Critical Hit cannot be repaired until the end of the encounter, and the ship suffers 2 points of system strain. If the ship or vehicle is without defense, reduce armor by 1 until the Critical Hit is repaired.

shipcrit.title: Engines Down
shipcrit.desc: The ship or vehicle's maximum speed is reduced to 0 until the Critical Hit is repaired, although it continues on its present course thanks to momentum. In addition, the ship cannot execute any maneuvers until the Critical Hit is repaired.

shipcrit.title: Major System Failure
shipcrit.desc: One component of the attacker's choice is heavily damaged and is inoperable until the Critical Hit is repaired. Use !shipsystems <small/large> for a list of systems by silhouette.

shipcrit.title: Major Hull Breach
shipcrit.desc: A huge, gaping tear is torn in the ship's hull, and the ship depressurizes. For ships and vehicles of silhouette 4 and smaller, the entire ship depressurizes in a number of rounds equal to the ship's silhouette. Ships and vehicles of silhouette 5 and larger tend to be highly compartmentalized and have many safeguards against depressurization. These ships don't completely depressurize. but parts do (the specifics regarding which parts depressurize is up to the GM; however, each section of the ship or vehicle that does lose air does so in a number of rounds equal to the vehicle's silhouette). Vehicles and ships operating in an atmosphere can better handle this Critical Hit. However, the huge tear still inflicts penalties, causing the vehicle to suffer the Destabilized Critical Hit instead (Reduce the vehicle's hull trauma threshold and stress strain threshold to half their original values until repaired).

shipcrit.title: Destabilized
shipcrit.desc: The ship or vehicle's structural integrity is seriously damaged. Reduce the ship or vehicle's hull trauma threshold and system strain threshold to half their original values until repaired.

shipcrit.title: Fire!
shipcrit.desc: Fire rages through the ship. The ship or vehicle immediately takes 2 points of system strain, and anyone caught in the fire takes damage as discussed on page AoR 228. A fire can be put out with some quick thinking and appropriate skill or Vigilance and/or Cool checks at the Game Master's discretion. Once going, a fire takes one round per 2 of the ship's silhouette points to put out.

shipcrit.title: Breaking Up
shipcrit.desc: The vehicle or ship has suffered so much damage that it begins to come apart at its seams, breaking up and disintegrating around the crew. At the end of the following round, the ship is completely destroyed, and the surrounding environment is littered with debris. Anyone aboard the ship or vehicle has one round to get to an escape pod, bail out, or dive for the nearest hatch before they are lost.

shipcrit.title: Vaporized
shipcrit.desc: The ship or vehicle is completely destroyed, consumed in a particularly large and dramatic fireball. Nothing survives.
